TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BaseValueSource extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the property system source of a particular dependency property value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by a property within the <xref:System.Windows.ValueSource> structure, which in turn is obtained by calling a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyHelper.GetValueSource%2A> method against a particular dependency property.
Each value of this enumeration indicates that a particular aspect of the overall [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system was responsible for the effective value determination of a certain dependency property value on a specific dependency object. To learn more about the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system and the precedence at which each aspect of the property system operates, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The value Default is not the default value of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource Default = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Source is the default value, as defined by property metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource DefaultStyle = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Source is from a setter in the default style. The default style comes from the current theme.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource DefaultStyleTrigger = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Source is from a trigger in the default style. The default style comes from the current theme.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource ImplicitStyleReference = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Source is an implicit style reference (style was based on detected type or based type). This value is only returned for the Style property itself, not for properties that are set through setters or triggers of such a style.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource Inherited = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Source is a value through property value inheritance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource Local = int32(11)

Docs.summary: Source is a locally set value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource ParentTemplate = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Source is based on a parent template being used by an element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource ParentTemplateTrigger = int32(10)

Docs.summary: Source is a trigger-based value from a parent template that created the element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource Style = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Source is from a style setter of a non-theme style.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource StyleTrigger = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Source is a trigger-based value of a non-theme style.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource TemplateTrigger = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Source is a trigger-based value in a template that is from a non-theme style.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.BaseValueSource Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Source is not known. This is the default value.
